RevisionEvent.Note: THEMIS Ground Observatories: Delete obsolete www-spc.igpp.ucla.edu Information URL, Resource Header Description reformated, Replace spurious YKNF information present in the NRSQ description. Metadata submitted by L.F. Bargatze on 2022-02-14, reviewed by LFB

ResourceHeader.Description:
Taloyoak (TALO) station is located in Taloyoak, NU, Canada. TALO is part of the UCLA GBO Network.

+--------------------------------------------+
| Station Characteristics | Value  | Units   |
|-------------------------|--------|---------|
| Magnetic Latitude       |  48.26 | degrees |
| Magnetic Longitude      | 331.23 | degrees |
| Magnetic Declination    | -15.78 | degrees |
| UT of Magnetic Midnight |  06:39 | HH:MM   |
+--------------------------------------------+

Magnetic coordinates obtained by calculation using the GEO-CGM online calculator with IGRF 2010 at altitude of 0 km.
ResourceHeader.Acknowledgement: We acknowledge NASA contract NAS5-02099 and V. Angelopoulos for use of data from the THEMIS Mission.

OperatingSpan.Note: Start date taken as the start of the day, that ia 00:00:00 UT, for the first CDF data file under the https://spdf.gsfc.nasa.gov/pub/data/themis/thg/l2/mag/ data tree. However, no data files found do the Start date listed is provisional.
